abstract: The Bancroft family and even some of its advisers seem sharply split over whether to sell Dow Jones & Company to Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation.
snippet: The Bancroft family and even some of its advisers seem sharply split over whether to sell Dow Jones & Company to Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation.
lead_paragraph: Despite an imminent deadline, the Bancroft family and even some of its advisers seem sharply split over whether to sell Dow Jones & Company, the publisher of The Wall Street Journal, to Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation.

headline.main: Bancrofts Said Divided as Journal Deadline Looms
headline.print_headline: Family That Controls Wall Street Journal Is Said to Remain Divided as Sale Deadline Looms

abstract: Despite an imminent deadline, the Bancroft family and even some of its advisers seem sharply split over whether to sell Dow Jones, the publisher of The Wall Street Journal, to Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation.
lead_paragraph: Despite an imminent deadline, the Bancroft family and even some of its advisers seem sharply split over whether to sell Dow Jones, the publisher of The Wall Street Journal, to Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation.

headline.main: Bancrofts Said to Be Divided as Deadline Looms

abstract: Whither Dow Jones if Murdoch Walks?
snippet: Whither Dow Jones if Murdoch Walks?
lead_paragraph: Rupert Murdoch has threatened to withdraw his offer for Dow Jones if enough Bancroft family members do not switch by 5 p.m.

headline.main: If Dow Jones Is Not Sold

abstract: With a 5 p.m. deadline hours away, a spokesman for Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation said the media conglomerate was ”highly unlikely” to proceed with its offer to buy Dow Jones, the publisher of Wall Street Journal, if support for the deal remains at its currently reported levels.
lead_paragraph: With a 5 p.m. deadline hours away, a spokesman for Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation said the media conglomerate was ”highly unlikely” to proceed with its offer to buy Dow Jones, the publisher of Wall Street Journal, if support for the deal remains at its currently reported levels.

headline.main: Dow Jones’ Stock Dips on News Corp. Comment
